metadata.description: Foxleigh & Foxleigh Digital Consultancy: Delivering innovative digital solutions with over 35 years of combined experience in the public and private sectors. JOSCAR and Cyber Essentials certified for excellence and security.
metadata.author: Foxleigh & Foxleigh

title: Welcome to Foxleigh & Foxleigh
pageIntroText: Where innovation meets expertise to propel your digital landscape forward. Harness the power of over 35 years of combined experience with a JOSCAR and Cyber Essentials certified consultancy that understands the ins and outs of both public and private sectors. Ready to elevate your project? Connect with us today!

cards.title: Public Sector Digital Excellence
cards.description: Specializing in scalable digital solutions tailored for government agencies. Our hands-on experience with the UK Government, the Royal Navy, and the NHS equips us to handle complex challenges with ease.

cards.title: Private Sector Innovations
cards.description: From strategy to implementation, we drive digital transformation in the private sector. Our work with brands like Unilever and Accenture showcases our capability to enhance your digital presence and operations.

cards.title: Comprehensive Security and Compliance
cards.description: Security at the forefront: As JOSCAR certified consultants, we ensure your digital projects meet stringent security standards, keeping your data safe and compliant.

children.text: At Foxleigh & Foxleigh, we blend technical proficiency with creative thinking to deliver exceptional digital experiences. Our approach not only solves immediate needs but also anticipates future challenges. Let's build something remarkable together.

content.text: Our expertise spans across multiple industries and sectors, ensuring tailored solutions that meet your specific needs.

children.text: We provide cutting-edge digital consultancy services that drive success and foster innovation.
Our team is composed of experts with extensive experience in both the public and private sectors.
